entry.title: $2195 // Beautiful New 2 Bedroom - PRIME PROSPECT LEFFERTS steps to Park + more
entry.content:
HOT DEAL! Beautiful New 2 Bedroom - PRIME PROSPECT LEFFERTS GARDENS! BLOCK FROM PROSPECT PARK!
Steps to the B, Q, 2, 5, Trains and the Franklin Av Shuttle
For more info, CALL or TEXT Benny TODAY! @ 646-963-5926 / Benny@zjamarealty.com

APARTMENT FEATURES:
-2 Large Bedrooms
-Large living room
-Brand new kitchen with all stainless New steel appliances
-Spacious fully tiled bathroom
-Heat & Hot water included

This unit is conveniently located across the street from Prospect Park, & steps to all the best Restaurants, Bars, Cafes, Health food stores, & Parks Prospect Lefferts Gardens has to offer!

For more info, CALL or TEXT Benny TODAY! @ 646-963-5926 / Benny@zjamarealty.com
